Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.xoxinternals.model

Interface XoxGameReadOnly

All Known Implementing Classes:
XoxGame
public interface XoxGameReadOnly
Read-only interface for Xox game model

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    BoardReadOnly getBoard()
    Retrieves the board of a generic game.
    PlayerReadOnly getPlayerByName​(java.lang.String name)
    Look up a player by name
    PlayerReadOnly getPlayerInfo​(int index)
    Returns bundled information on a player, accessed by the player index within this game instance.
    PlayerReadOnly[] getPlayers()
    Retrieves the array (in order of registration) of players associated to a game object.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerByName

      PlayerReadOnly getPlayerByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Look up a player by name
      Parameters:
      name - as the name of the player to look up.
      Returns:
      PlayerReadOnly as the matching player object, if associated. Null otherwise.

    • getBoard

      BoardReadOnly getBoard()
      Retrieves the board of a generic game.
      Returns:
      the read-only board of a game.

    • getPlayers

      PlayerReadOnly[] getPlayers()
      Retrieves the array (in order of registration) of players associated to a game object. Only returns a deep copy of the original players array.
      Returns:
      a deep copy of the player array associated to a game.

    • getPlayerInfo

      PlayerReadOnly getPlayerInfo​(int index)
      Returns bundled information on a player, accessed by the player index within this game instance.
      Parameters:
      index - to select the player. Either 0 or 1.
      Returns:
      the player info bundle.
